alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Hancock; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Baldwin, central Hancock and northwestern Washington Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Sparta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sparta, Hamburg State Park, Devereux, Beulah, Warthen, Underwood, Linton and Culverton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
